articles.author: Sam Carney
articles.title: Team news for United v Liverpool - Man Utd
articles.description: A look at both squads before Sunday's meeting, as Ten Hag's side manage defensive injuries.
articles.content:
LIVERPOOL TEAM NEWS
Liverpool scored two late goals to see off struggling Sheffield United 3-1 at Anfield on Thursday night, as Ibrahima Konate, who missed last month’s FA Cup meeting due to a thigh… [+754 chars]
